title: Natural Language Processing for Compliance Insights
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead, I want the ALFRED system to utilize natural language processing capabilities to analyze user interactions and flag potential compliance issues in real-time, so that I can ensure adherence to regulations without hindering the development process.

title: Customizable Voice Interaction Settings
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead, I want to ensure that developers can customize voice interaction settings to align with legal compliance and risk management standards, so that we can maintain user privacy and security while enhancing the user experience.

title: Feedback Mechanism for User Commands
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want the ALFRED system to provide a feedback mechanism for user commands so that I can ensure that all interactions comply with data privacy regulations and maintain a secure environment for users.

title: Integration with Third-Party Voice Services
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that integrations with third-party voice services are compliant with legal standards so that developers can create secure and reliable applications that respect user privacy and data protection regulations.

title: User Command Personalization Features
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that user command personalization features are designed with compliance-by-design principles so that developers can create applications that respect user privacy and maintain data security while providing tailored interactions.

title: Support for Multi-User Voice Profiles
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead, I want the ALFRED system to support multi-user voice profiles so that developers can create applications that manage user-specific data securely and maintain compliance with data privacy regulations.

title: Accessibility Features for Voice Interaction
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead, I want to ensure that the voice interaction features are accessible to all users, so that we can comply with legal standards and enhance user engagement without creating barriers.

title: Error Handling and Recovery for Voice Commands
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want to ensure that the ALFRED system has robust error handling for voice commands so that compliance and security measures are upheld even when user interactions fail, maintaining user trust and data integrity.

title: Real-Time Speech Recognition Accuracy
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead in Digital Health Application Development, I want the ALFRED system to have high accuracy in real-time speech recognition so that the applications developed for older adults can effectively understand and respond to user commands, ensuring compliance with accessibility and data privacy standards.

title: Documentation for Voice Command Development
summary: As a Compliance and Risk Lead, I want comprehensive documentation for voice command development so that I can ensure compliance with legal standards while enabling developers to integrate voice interactions seamlessly.
